summary: This is a short mod, that simply unchecks the \\\'\\\'essential\\\'\\\' box of both Hadvar and Ralof, the Imperial Soldier and the Stormcloak Rebel you meet at the beginning of the game, so that it might just be so that you are the only survivor of the dragon attack in Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
This is a short mod, that simply unchecks the \\\'\\\'essential\\\'\\\' box of both Hadvar and Ralof, the Imperial Soldier and the Stormcloak Rebel you meet at the beginning of the game, so that it might just be so that you are the only survivor of the dragon attack in Helgen.


I am planning on expanding on the Mortallity mod over the coming days.

Planned Mods:

Mortallity  -  Jarls and Nobles
Mortallity  -  Main Quest Characters
Mortallity  -  Dawnguard
Mortallity  -  Dragonborn
Mortallity  -  Children

If you have any more suggestions, please leave them in the comment section and I will see that they are added to the list.


PLEASE NOTE THAT BY DOWNLOADING THIS MOD, YOU ARE USING IT AT YOUR OWN RISK. I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY BROKEN QUESTS, SAVEGAMES OR OTHER THINGS, CAUSED BY THIS MOD.


If you have questions, feel free to ask them in the comments section.


Added Fredas, eigth of First Seed 2013
author: Mizreg
